text: Dock, West India Middle Dock, West India North Dock, Blackwall Basin, and Poplar Dock in Canary Wharf. 18.53 In line with London Plan policies and guidance, provision of appropriate water space support infrastructure (including but not limited to: transport and essential access infrastructure into and alongside water spaces, boatyards, eco-moorings, jetties and safety equipment) will be supported at suitable locations. Further details on infrastructure for water-related and water-dependent uses are included in Policy BO2. The Infrastructure Delivery Plan provides information on the current need for some water support infrastructure (e.g. bridges).
